snippet.title: The Dark Eternal: Pre-Title Intro
snippet.description:
This is the updated pre-title intro sequence that will be featured in Dark Eternal v2.0, coming in late 2021.

The Intro originally glossed over events that happen throughout the game, but was updated to be a brief recap of the original "Dissolution" that sets up the story of "The Dark Eternal".

This decision was made with the knowledge that many players will not have played "Dissolution", and because of how old it is it is unreasonable to expect that they would.

The goal is that a new player would have a barebones understanding of what happened in the original game.
